title: New Team is searching Members ( Diamond )
body:
I am searching Members, who are in Dia+.This Team will not be just a Hobby Team, if possible we try to participate at Tournaments.
What you need is :
-Teamspeak
-Quality Headset
-English
-Time spot from 20 CEST - 22/23 CEST
-Communication

I am looking for every role but Support, just add me, and write me a short Apply.

|FreNaxe
